vulnerable_code: checkClientTrusted, checkServerTrusted methods in X509TrustManager implementation
description: The provided code implements X509TrustManager interface, but the checkClientTrusted and checkServerTrusted methods are empty, which allows any certificate to be trusted without any validation. This can lead to potential man-in-the-middle attacks.
recommendation: Implement proper certificate validation in the checkClientTrusted and checkServerTrusted methods, using a trusted certificate authority and proper certificate chain validation.
